segments.text: If you like you can try it on.The fitting room is in the corner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . What do you think of it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it fits you . It flatters your figure .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . But can I try another one ? I don't like the color .
segments.speaker: S2
